thread.title: Sushmita Sen Shares Why She’s Single At 41
thread.title_full: Sushmita Sen Shares Why She’s Single At 41

author: Swagata Dam
title: Sushmita Sen Shares Why She’s Single At 41
text:
Swagata Dam Mar . 4 . 2017 Sushmita Sen 
A mother of two, Sushmita Sen is single at 41. And of course, she’s in no hurry to change that by getting married anytime soon. And why would she be? After all, she’s beautiful, super sexy, successful and just fabulous. A man has be able to match her caliber to find a permanent place in her life, no ? The stunning Sush recently took to Instagram to share why she is still single. A post shared by Sushmita Sen (@sushmitasen47) on Mar 2, 2017 at 10:51am PST 
Attagirl!
